title: Capital Planning
description: Analysis of capital project budget by budget year and group

ObjectID.description: A unique id to represent each entry

BudgetYear.description: The budget year for the city

Section.description: The section of government this entry concerns

Parent.description: The parent of the planning entry

LineDescription.description: A description of the line item this entry concerns

FundingGroup.description: The group where the funding from this entry is coming from

Total.description: Total budget for the cost of this entry

BudgetVersion.description: The version of the budget it corresponds to

Entity.description: The entity that corresponds to this entry eg. GovtSrvcs
